data.title: Krishna Kanta Handiqui State Open University (KKHSOU): Courses, Contact Details, Facilities
data.meta_description: Get complete details on Krishna Kanta Handiqui State Open University (KKHSOU) courses, facilities, contact details, latest updates and campus details.
data.text:
BA

Candidates who have passed Higher Secondary examination in any stream and those who have passed relevant BPP from KKHSOU are eligible to take admission in BA programme. Candidates who have passed BPP from IGNOU or any other open university will be eligible take admission, Candidates must pass the programme specific courses of BPP of this university for which they will have to take admission into BPP simultaneously.

B.Com

Candidates who have passed Higher Secondary examination in any stream and those who have passed relevant Bachelor Preparatory Programme(BPP) from KKHSOU are eligible to take admission in BA programme. Candidates who have passed BPP from IGNOU or any other open university will be eligible take admission, Candidates must pass the programme specific courses of BPP of this university for which they will have to take admission into BPP simultaneously.

BCA

Candidates who have passed Higher Secondary examination in Science stream with Physics and Mathematics among other subjects. Candidates who have passed the relevant BPP of this University. Candidates who have passed from Polytechnics in the subject of interest. Candidates who have passed Higher Secondary in Arts and Commerce, Financial Market Mechanism (FMM) under CBSE, vocational stream with the required subject will have to successfully complete the Papers 4, 5 & 6 of streams 3 only of BPP course.

MA

Candidates having B.Ed degree are eligible to get admission in MA Education. Candidates not having a subject in their Bachelor's Programme but desirous of pursuing Master's Degree in that subject may be allowed to take admission with the condition that they clear the core courses of the subject in 1st and 2nd Semesters of Bachelorâ€™s Degree.

M.Sc

Candidates must have Mathematics or Computer Science at 10+2 level. Candidates who do not have Mathematics/Computer Science at 10+2 level shall have to clear the Papers IV, V & VI (First year) of Stream 3 of (BPP) within four semesters of MCA.
